meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from coumarin.
meanings.sent1: The coumaric aroma of the flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent2: Her perfume had a sweet, coumaric scent.
meanings.sent3: The coumaric essence of the dish made everyone crave more.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with coumaric hues.
meanings.sent5: The coumaric flavor lingered on his taste buds long after the meal.

meanings.sent1: The soap had a coumaric fragrance that reminded her of spring.
meanings.sent2: The lotion had a smooth, coumaric texture.
meanings.sent3: The coumaric color of the dress made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The music had a coumaric rhythm that was soothing to the ears.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the coumaric beauty of the countryside perfectly.
